Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility of the applicant's claim for asylum
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Panel questioned credibility due to inconsistencies (e.g., inability to provide full name of Vikki) and lack of corroborative evidence
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 97 or Section 98 of IRPA (protection provisions)
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged police persecution in country of origin
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in testimony and lack of corroboration
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to provide consistent and credible testimony
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Perverse or capricious standard for factual findings
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None identified – panel considered available evidence
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected based on lack of credibility
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the panel made an unreasonable credibility assessment
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Rule: Court intervenes only if decision is perverse, capricious, or ignores material evidence
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistent testimony, lack of probative evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Inability to recall key details, lack of supporting documents
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged reasonableness of credibility finding
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Canada (Federal Court review of IRB decision)
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to provide full identifying information

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility of smuggling and persecution claims
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Medical reports did not confirm injuries were from police actions; lack of corroboration
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to lack of credibility
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to establish refugee status
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Inconsistencies in testimony regarding persecution and smuggling route
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Standard of reasonableness in reviewing administrative decisions
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Fairness and completeness of hearing before Refugee Protection Division
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Persecution in India and smuggling to Malaysia
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Panel considered all material before it
Crimes.Legal_Rule_Source: Federal Court jurisprudence on reasonableness review
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Certification of question and overturning of decision
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Asylum seeker under refugee determination process
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Smuggling into a third country prior to Canada
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Panel’s decision must be reasonable and based on evidence

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility of applicant's allegations of torture and harassment
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Panel found contradictions in testimony, including inability to name key individuals
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Testimonial evidence, lack of official documentation
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged persecution and torture by Indian police
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of probative evidence and internal inconsistencies
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to provide verifiable details and corroborating evidence
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Decision must not be perverse or capricious
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: No indication that relevant evidence was ignored
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to lack of credibility
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the panel unreasonably assessed credibility
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Federal Court intervenes only if decision is based on erroneous fact in a capricious manner
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credible and corroborated evidence
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Absence of supporting documents, inconsistent statements
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Hearing conducted in accordance with procedural fairness
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Submission of claim involving false or unsubstantiated documentation
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Contradictions in testimony, failure to recall critical details
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of adverse credibility finding
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of administrative tribunal decision
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to provide full names and verifiable events
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Misrepresentation through false statements in claim
